description.value:
As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Small or Medium animal, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.tjdfluulncmqacc3]{Beast Shape I}.

At 9th level, you can assume the form of a Tiny or Large animal, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.774kmgcb7ygviht0]{Beast Shape II}.

At 11th level, you can assume the form of a Diminutive or Huge animal or a Small or Medium magical beast, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.w88ddxpu89qcr5c0]{Beast Shape III}.

At 13th level, you can assume the form of a Tiny or Large magical beast, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.br37848gchetel0q]{Beast Shape IV}.

You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 1 hour/level.

You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
